title: Pirates.Of.The.Caribbean.2003.REPACK-vol1
description:
Pirates.Of.The.Caribbean.2003.REPACK-vol1

Pirates of the Caribbean - a PC game from 2003.


This release includes 2 fixes: 
                     
1. startup crash fix:
This is confirmed working, although only with the swiftshader settings on low, which will make the game look a bit grainy. All you need to do to use it is unpack the file named startupcrashfix.zip in your game folder.
An alternative solution may be to disable your onboard graphics (untested). 

2. Intel onboard graphics new-game-crash-fix:
Copy the sea_modified.dll located in the main game folder to MODULES and rename it to sea.dll.

You can change your resolution to full HD (1920x1080) in the file "engine.ini".


1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play

If you found a better solution than swiftshader for the startup crash-to-desktop, kindly leave a comment with a link.
